text: Ke kaloku uAllâh Wanidala ngothuli, emva koko (nadalwa) ngeqabaza lembewu yomntu: Wanenzela abalingane. Kananjalo akukho mntu wasetyhini ukhawulwayo kungekho unokuze azale ngaphandle kolwazi lwaKhe. Kungekho mntu waluphalayo unikwa ubomi (obongezelelweyo) nobude bobomi bakhe bufinyezwe, koko oko kuseNcwadini. Inene oko kulula kuAllâh
